Title: Andrews Sweet beef Stew

NutritionInfo.SingularYieldUnit: Paid API plan required for nutrition.

Description: A sweet beef stew that compares to traditional lamb shanks

Ingredients.PreparationNotes: 1 teaspoon mustard paste(your choice of style), 1 table spoon wo
Ingredients.Name: tomatoes diced

Instructions:
Remove meat from bones and place bones into 2 cups of water on medium heat add salt and half of brown vinegar and half of sugar, let simmer for about 5 mins.
Add half of wochester sauce to broth wait about 1 min and strain the contents of the pot and keep the broth.

Chunk the beef, and lightly brown before adding half of the broth, then add can of diced tomatoes and tomato paste, let simmer down. Add the rest of the sugar, brown vingar, wochester sauce, and add the mustard and soy sauce.

Add the onion and garlic let simmer for about 2 min, then add the rest of the broth. Then add the vegetable and pasta.

Allow to simmer on low with the lid on for about 25 mins or until the pasta and vegetables are suitable for your taste.
